content.text:
# Kings and Queens (Anti-Nowhere League album)

| rev2      =
| rev2Score =
}}
Kings and Queens is the fourth studio album by English punk rock band Anti-Nowhere League.
Track listing
All songs written by Animal/Anti-Nowhere League unless noted.
#"Degeneration" – 3:02
#"Mother's Cunt" – 3:13
#"Kings and Queens" – 3:33
#"Just Another Day (In Paradise)" – 3:40
#"Piggy (The Lesson of Life)" – 4:18
#"Wet Dream" (Max Romeo) – 2:53
#"Pump Action" – 4:41
#"There Is No God" – 3:38
#"Mission to Mars" – 4:10
#"Am I Dead?" – 3:55
#"Dead Heroes" – 3:43
#"The Punk Prayer" – 4:17
Personnel
*Animal – vocals
*Jez – guitars
*Shady – bass
*PJ – drums
References
